name: Orxel
description:
Orxel is a simple puzzle game where you must connect blocks of the same color to empower yourself to fire a laser.

The laser you produce will be of the same color as the connect blocks and can only destroy monsters of this color.

User WASD or the arrow keys to move.

Once you are empowered by standing next to connect blocks, aim using the mouse  fire using the left mouse button.

---------------------------------------------------

Developer Notes.

Orxel was created during the 48 Indie tales game jam.
It was intended to be a game where the player is stuck in a room that must needs to be organised during a day cycle which helps you survive a night cycle where monsters appear by providing perks and tools to fend off your foes.

The game is also missing much of its planned animations and sound design.

Possiblity to continue developing the game towards its intended design is plausable.
